desc: We believe that every day brings an opportunity for you to wake up and make a difference. Slix helps people do this by offering a better alternative in our CBD cigarette. We use 100% USA grown organic hemp and an environmentally friendly biodegradable filter. NO tobacco/nicotine. 7% promise to Last Prisoner Project.

layout.text: Tobacco Free. Nicotine Free. Less than 0.3% THC
